original_solution_mapping.L1: On the night of the dance 70/100*400 = <<70/100*400=280>>280 students who showed up to the party were invited.
original_solution_mapping.L2: If 40% of those invited to the party had their invitation revoked, there were 40/100*280 = <<40/100*280=112>>112 students who showed up and had their invitation revoked.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The number of invited students who attended the party is 280-112 = <<280-112=168>>168

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3567.
    Returns: the number of invited students who attended the party.
    """
    # L1
    invited_percentage = Fraction(70, 100) # 70% of the students who showed up were invited
    total_students_showed_up = 400 # 400 students show up to the party
    invited_students = invited_percentage * total_students_showed_up

    # L2
    revoked_percentage = Fraction(40, 100) # 40% of those invited to the party had their invitation revoked
    students_with_revoked_invitation = revoked_percentage * invited_students

    # L3
    invited_students_attended = invited_students - students_with_revoked_invitation

    # FA
    answer = invited_students_attended
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: On the night of the dance {invited_percentage}*{total_students_showed_up} = <<{invited_percentage}*{total_students_showed_up}={invited_students}>>{invited_students} students who showed up to the party were invited.

If {revoked_percentage} of those invited to the party had their invitation revoked, there were {revoked_percentage}*{invited_students} = <<{revoked_percentage}*{invited_students}={students_with_revoked_invitation}>>{students_with_revoked_invitation} students who showed up and had their invitation revoked.

The number of invited students who attended the party is {invited_students}-{students_with_revoked_invitation} = <<{invited_students}-{students_with_revoked_invitation}={invited_students_attended}>>{invited_students_attended}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: On the night of the dance 400*400 = <<400*400=160000>>160000 students who showed up to the party were invited.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: If 40/100 of those invited to the party had their invitation revoked, there were 40/100*160000 = <<40/100*160000=64000>>64000 students who showed up and had their invitation revoked.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: The number of invited students who attended the party is 160000-64000 = <<160000-64000=96000>>96000

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'total_students_showed_up' (400) was used instead of 'invited_percentage' (70/100).
